display_name: What kind of diet are you following?
domain: 0=balanced, 1=high protein, 2=high fat, 3=low calorie, 4=low carbohydrate, 5=low fat, 6=low salt, 7=low sugar, 8=gluten-free, 9=paleo, 10=vegan (no dairy, no eggs), 11=vegetarian - lacto-ovo (dairy and eggs ok), 12=vegetarian - lacto (dairy ok, no eggs), 13=vegetarian - ovo (no dairy, eggs ok), 14=raw, 15=other
